verses.verse: לֵאמֹ֡ר <WH559> They say הֵ֣ן <WH2005> If יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> put away אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> If a man אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּוֹ֩ <WH802> his wife וְהָלְכָ֨ה <WH1980> and she go מֵאִתּ֜וֹ <WH853> וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> and belongs לְאִישׁ־ <WH376> man's אַחֵ֗ר <WH312> from him and become another הֲיָשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> shall he return unto her again אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> about ע֔וֹד <WH5750> still הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not חָנ֥וֹף <WH2610> be greatly תֶּחֱנַ֖ף <WH2610> polluted הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ? shall not that land הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְאַ֗תְּ <WH859> you זָנִית֙ <WH2181> ? but thou hast played the harlot רֵעִ֣ים <WH7453> lovers רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> with many וְשׁ֥וֹב <WH7725> yet return again אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> to me saith יְהֹוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

שְׂאִֽי־ <WH5375> Lift up עֵינַ֨יִךְ <WH5869> thine eyes עַל־ <WH5921> unto שְׁפָיִ֜ם <WH8205> unto the high places וּרְאִ֗י <WH7200> and see אֵיפֹה֙ <WH375> where לֹ֣א <WH3808> not [שֻׁגַּלְתְּ כ] (שֻׁכַּ֔בְּתְּ <WH7693> lie with ק) עַל־ <WH5921> with דְּרָכִים֙ <WH1870> with In the ways יָשַׁ֣בְתְּ <WH3427> hast thou sat לָהֶ֔ם כַּעֲרָבִ֖י <WH6163> for them as the Arabian בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַתַּחֲנִ֣יפִי <WH2610> and thou hast polluted אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land בִּזְנוּתַ֖יִךְ <WH2184> with thy whoredoms וּבְרָעָתֵֽךְ׃ <WH7451> and with thy wickedness

וַיִּמָּנְע֣וּ <WH4513> have been withholden רְבִבִ֔ים <WH7241> Therefore the showers וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <WH4456> and there hath been no latter rain ל֣וֹא <WH3808> no הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> has been וּמֵ֨צַח <WH4696> forehead אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> ess זוֹנָה֙ <WH2181> commit fornication הָ֣יָה <WH1961> had לָ֔ךְ מֵאַ֖נְתְּ <WH3985> thou refusedst הִכָּלֵֽם׃ <WH3637> to be ashamed

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not מֵעַ֔תָּה <WH6258> now [קָרָאתִי כ] (קָרָ֥את <WH7121> bewray ק) לִ֖י אָבִ֑י <WH1> unto me My father אַלּ֥וּף <WH441> thou [art] the guide נְעֻרַ֖י <WH5271> childhood אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

הֲיִנְטֹ֣ר <WH5201> Will he reserve לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> alway אִם־ <WH518> lo יִשְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> beward לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> alway הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold [דִבַּרְתִּי כ] (דִבַּ֛רְתְּ <WH1696> answer ק) וַתַּעֲשִׂ֥י <WH6213> and done הָרָע֖וֹת <WH7451> evil things וַתּוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> as thou couldest פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> God אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בִּימֵי֙ <WH3117> also unto me in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הֲ‍ֽרָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> Hast thou seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what עָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> hath done מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <WH4878> [that] which backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel הֹלְכָ֨ה <WH1980> ? she is gone up הִ֜יא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֗הַּ <WH1364> upon every high וְאֶל־ <WH413> and תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָ֖ן <WH7488> every green וַתִּזְנִי־ <WH2181> and there hath played the harlot שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And I said אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> after עֲשׂוֹתָ֧הּ <WH6213> she had done אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these אֵלַ֥י <WH413> about תָּשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> all these [things] Turn וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁ֑בָה <WH7725> thou unto me But she returned [וַתֵּרֶאה כ] (וַתֵּ֛רֶא <WH7200> advise self ק) בָּגוֹדָ֥ה <WH901> not And her treacherous אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <WH269> sister יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וָאֵ֗רֶא <WH7200> And I saw כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> that כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֹדוֹת֙ <WH182> when for all the causes אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after נִֽאֲפָה֙ <WH5003> committed adultery מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <WH4878> whereby backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel שִׁלַּחְתִּ֕יהָ <WH7971> I had put her away וָאֶתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> and given אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> her a bill כְּרִיתֻתֶ֖יהָ <WH3748> of divorce אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> about וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> did not יָֽרְאָ֜ה <WH3372> feared בֹּֽגֵדָ֤ה <WH898> yet her treacherous יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Judah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <WH269> sister וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַתִּ֥זֶן <WH2181> and played the harlot גַּם־ <WH1571> also הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become מִקֹּ֣ל <WH6963> And it came to pass through the lightness זְנוּתָ֔הּ <WH2184> of her whoredom וַתֶּחֱנַ֖ף <WH2610> that she defiled אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וַתִּנְאַ֥ף <WH5003> and committed adultery אֶת־ <WH854> with הָאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> with stones וְאֶת־ <WH854> for הָעֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> and with stocks וְגַם־ <WH1571> again בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all manner

זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁ֨בָה <WH7725> hath not turned אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about בָּגוֹדָ֧ה <WH901> And yet for all this her treacherous אֲחוֹתָ֛הּ <WH269> sister יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all לִבָּ֑הּ <WH3820> unto me with her whole heart כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּשֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> but feignedly נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about צִדְּקָ֥ה <WH6663> hath justified נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> herself מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <WH4878> unto me The backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel מִבֹּגֵדָ֖ה <WH898> more than treacherous יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

הָלֹ֡ךְ <WH1980> Go וְקָֽרָאתָ֩ <WH7121> and proclaim אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֨ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these צָפ֗וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וְ֠אָמַרְתָּ <WH559> and say שׁ֣וּבָה <WH7725> Return מְשֻׁבָ֤ה <WH4878> thou backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לֽוֹא־ <WH3808> I will not אַפִּ֥יל <WH5307> to fall פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> [and] I will not cause mine anger בָּכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָסִ֤יד <WH2623> upon you for I [am] merciful אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֶטּ֖וֹר <WH5201> [and] I will not keep לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [anger] for ever

אַ֚ךְ <WH389> Only דְּעִ֣י <WH3045> Only acknowledge עֲוֹנֵ֔ךְ <WH5771> thine iniquity כִּ֛י <WH3588> against בַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖יִךְ <WH430> thy God פָּשָׁ֑עַתְּ <WH6586> that thou hast transgressed וַתְּפַזְּרִ֨י <WH6340> and hast scattered אֶת־ <WH853> דְּרָכַ֜יִךְ <WH1870> thy ways לַזָּרִ֗ים <WH2114> to the strangers תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָ֔ן <WH7488> under every green וּבְקוֹלִ֥י <WH6963> my voice לֹא־ <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> and ye have not obeyed נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהֹוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn בָנִ֤ים <WH1121> children שׁוֹבָבִים֙ <WH7726> O backsliding נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I בָּעַ֣לְתִּי <WH1166> for I am married בָכֶ֑ם וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <WH3947> unto you and I will take אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> you one מֵעִ֗יר <WH5892> of a city וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two מִמִּשְׁפָּחָ֔ה <WH4940> of a family וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> you to Zion

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will give לָכֶ֛ם רֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> you pastors כְּלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> according to mine heart וְרָע֥וּ <WH7462> which shall feed אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> דֵּעָ֥ה <WH1844> you with knowledge וְהַשְׂכֵּֽיל׃ <WH7919> and understanding

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> become כִּ֣י <WH3588> when תִרְבּוּ֩ <WH7235> And it shall come to pass when ye be multiplied וּפְרִיתֶ֨ם <WH6509> and increased בָּאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> in the land בַּיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> in those days הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> those נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> will no יֹ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> they shall say ע֗וֹד <WH5750> longer אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> no more The ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> neither shall it come עַל־ <WH5921> unto לֵ֑ב <WH3820> to mind וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יִזְכְּרוּ־ <WH2142> neither shall they remember בוֹ֙ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִפְקֹ֔דוּ <WH6485> it neither shall they visit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will no יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> [it] neither shall [that] be done עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> they יִקְרְא֤וּ <WH7121> they shall call לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> Jerusalem כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> the throne יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנִקְוּ֨וּ <WH6960> shall be gathered אֵלֶ֧יהָ <WH413> about כָֽל־ <WH3605> all manner הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> and all the nations לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> unto it to the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יֵלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> walk ע֔וֹד <WH5750> anymore אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> any more after שְׁרִר֖וּת <WH8307> the imagination לִבָּ֥ם <WH3820> heart הָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> of their evil ס

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> those יֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> will walk בֵית־ <WH1004> the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah עַל־ <WH5921> with בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> with the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיָבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> and they shall come יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> to the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i הִנְחַ֖לְתִּי <WH5157> that I have given for an inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto your fathers

וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> But I said אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How אֲשִׁיתֵ֣ךְ <WH7896> How shall I put בַּבָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> thee among the children וְאֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> and give לָךְ֙ אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land חֶמְדָּ֔ה <WH2532> thee a pleasant נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> heritage צְבִ֖י <WH6643> a goodly צִבְא֣וֹת <WH6635> of the hosts גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> Gentile וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> said אָבִי֙ <WH1> me My father [תִּקְרְאוּ־ כ] (תִּקְרְאִי־ <WH7121> shall call לִ֔י <WH7121> Thou shalt call ק) וּמֵאַחֲרַ֖י <WH310> from me לֹ֥א <WH3808> not [תָשׁוּבוּ כ] (תָשֽׁוּבִי׃ <WH7725> break ק)

אָכֵ֛ן <WH403> Surely בָּגְדָ֥ה <WH898> treacherously אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> [as] a wife מֵרֵעָ֑הּ <WH7453> departeth from her husband כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So בְּגַדְתֶּ֥ם <WH898> so have ye dealt treacherously בִּ֛י בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> with me O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

ק֚וֹל <WH6963> A voice עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁפָיִ֣ים <WH8205> upon the high places נִשְׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> was heard בְּכִ֥י <WH1065> weeping תַחֲנוּנֵ֖י <WH8469> [and] supplications בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because הֶעֱוּוּ֙ <WH5753> for they have perverted אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכָּ֔ם <WH1870> their way שָׁכְח֖וּ <WH7911> [and] they have forgotten אֶת־ <WH853> יְהֹוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God

שׁ֚וּבוּ <WH7725> Return בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> children שׁוֹבָבִ֔ים <WH7726> ye backsliding אֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH7495> [and] I will heal מְשׁוּבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4878> your backslidings הִנְנוּ֙ <WH2005> behold אָתָ֣נוּ <WH857> Behold we come לָ֔ךְ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You יְהֹוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto thee for thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God
